snippet: Managers of both high- and low-turnover funds have been struggling to deal with a market that can toggle almost daily between huge losses and gains.
abstract: Managers of both high- and low-turnover mutual funds have been struggling to deal with a volatile market that can toggle almost daily between huge losses and gains.
lead_paragraph: Managers of both high- and low-turnover funds have been struggling to deal with a market that can toggle almost daily between huge losses and gains.

headline.seo: Turnover Can Be a Quandary for Mutual Fund Managers
headline.main: How Often to Trade? It’s Tricky for Funds, Too
headline.print_headline: How Often to Trade? It’s Tricky for Funds, Too
